content.text: Match ends, Southampton 3, Newcastle United 1.
Second Half ends, Southampton 3, Newcastle United 1.
Foul by Siem de Jong (Newcastle United).
Graziano Pellè (Southampton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Newcastle United. Siem de Jong tries a through ball, but Aleksandar Mitrovic is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Oriol Romeu (Southampton) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Graziano Pellè.
Cuco Martina (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Papiss Demba Cissé (Newcastle United).
Attempt missed. Oriol Romeu (Southampton) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right following a corner.
Attempt blocked. Victor Wanyama (Southampton) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by Vurnon Anita.
Substitution, Southampton. Jay Rodriguez replaces Dusan Tadic.
Foul by Ryan Bertrand (Southampton).

Virgil van Dijk (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Offside, Southampton. Virgil van Dijk tries a through ball, but Dusan Tadic is caught offside.
Substitution, Southampton. James Ward-Prowse replaces Shane Long.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Fraser Forster.
Attempt saved. Andros Townsend (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Aleksandar Mitrovic.

Goal!  Southampton 3, Newcastle United 0. Victor Wanyama (Southampton) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner following a corner.

Substitution, Newcastle United. Jamaal Lascelles replaces Steven Taylor because of an injury.
Second Half begins Southampton 2, Newcastle United 0.
